content: KCM-MD Kwik Cast cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance multi-thread short plate cast-in-place anchor for concrete on metal deck with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Application-relevant multi-thread configurations Pre-assembled self-tapping screws reduce installation time Upper and lower flute installation offers flexibility Color-coded plastic plugs protect inner threads from concrete and Monokote® fireproofing KCM-MD Combo Bit, 2-in-1 setting tool, available for quick and easy installation Applications Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Seismic loading | Yes | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Material composition | Carbon steel, Zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2221457 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD S 1/4,3/8 GRN-RED - Package Size 90 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MD S (Sm R) Cast-in anchor assy - 2221458 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD S 1/4,3/8 GRN-GRN - Package Size 90 pc Package Contents: -
